item.title: 【HD Live Performances】FEED - Ellie Goulding - Love Me Like You Do (MTV Europe Music Awards, 2015) [caladan]
item.description:
This is a fixed version of this video. That original video had 2 very noticeable glitches (sudden loss of signal) that ruined its flow and affected the overall fps (which should be 25fps). I fixed them by using Avisynth and repeating the last good frame for each section as needed.

Another subtle fix: the original video had a small black border at the top only. I cut it and added half at the top of the frame, half at the bottom for a symmetrical view. Also the audio was too quiet, so I raised its volume.

Anyway, pick whatever version suits you better.



Hidden Content:
You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.
item.author: caladan
